title: Kairos
description: Sometimes the best day of your life is the one you never saw coming.Joe Cohen has devoted the past two years of his life to one the care and feeding of Kade Bosa. His partner in their PI business, roommate, and best friend, Kade is everything to Joe, even if their relationship falls short of what Joe desires most. But he won’t push. Kade has suffered a rough road, and Joe’s pretty sure he’s the only thing holding Kade together.Estranged from his own family, Joe knows the value of desperately holding on to someone dear, but he never expected his present and past to collide just as Kade’s is doing the same. Now they’ve stumbled across evidence that could change their the impact of Kade’s tragic past, their job partnership, and any future Joe might allow himself to wish for….
author: Mary Calmes
